biscuits.name: Book Swap
biscuits.desc: In a Scrum Team, we built a FrontEnd React App allowing users to borrow, return and add new books via fetch with a pre-built API. I worked on or contributed to most if not all of the stories in the project.

biscuits.name: Finance
biscuits.desc: As part of CS50 Problem Set 9, I built a modest frontend with Bootstrap and a backend with sqlite3 and flask to communicate with a live stock price API - allowing users to make secure accounts, buy and sell stocks at real world prices, and other features.

biscuits.name: WAV Reverse Algorithm
biscuits.desc: A personal favourite from CS50, I wrote an algorithm to reverse WAV files, using a nested for loop to swap data chunks while maintaining the file's original stereo image.

biscuits.name: This Portfolio Site
biscuits.desc: Fourth week project at iO Academy. I built a template portfolio website, that modestly utilises Barba.js, GSAP and ScrollTrigger to add visual appeal. Project information is fetched from a JSON as a teaching exercise.
